/* This user-defined trigger is called by some menu options
   to circumvent forms bug 263616. See library procedure
   invoked for more information */ 
begin
   default_value('','global.qms$proc_name');
   qms$do_menu_procedure(name_in('global.qms$proc_name'));
end;

   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No

/* CGGN$KEY_CLRFRM */
/* Perform the key's standard functionality */
BEGIN
  clear_form;
  IF :SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS = 'CHANGED' THEN
    RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
  END IF;
END;

/* CGCF$PERFORM_STARTUP */
/* Execute the WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE code that was created by Forms */
/*   Generator                                                       */
BEGIN
  BEGIN
    CG$WHEN_NEW_FORM_INSTANCE;
  EXCEPTION
    WHEN OTHERS THEN
      CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
  END;
END;

   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   * Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   * Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      Yes
   * 'Keyboard Help' Text

   * Trigger Text

	return;
   end if;

   ----------

   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

/* Forms generator creates ON-ERROR trigger on block level with
   'fire-in-enter-query' flag set to false.
   This form-level on-error trigger fires in enter-query mode as well,
   ensuring that messages issued in query mode are handled in the same way,
   i.e. by the same procedure (qms$show_message) as messages in normal mode */
begin
   if not qms$event('ON-ERROR') then
	return;
   end if;
end;

   * Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   * Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   * Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   * 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
   * Name                                            ON-INSERT
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text                                    

/* See library forms qmsmod34 and qmslib34 for comments on procedure invoked */
begin
   if not qms$event('ON-INSERT')  then
	return;
   end if;
end;

end;

/* CGGN$CALL_GENERATOR_CODE */
/* Execute the WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE code that was created by Forms */
/*   Generator                                                       */
BEGIN
  BEGIN
    CG$WHEN_NEW_FORM_INSTANCE;
  EXCEPTION
    WHEN OTHERS THEN
      CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
  END;
  
END;

   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No

   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   - Trigger Style                                   PL/SQL
   * Trigger Text

	return;
   end if;

   - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                        Yes
   - Execution Hierarchy                             Override
   - Display in 'Keyboard Help'                      No
   * 'Keyboard Help' Text                            
   - Trigger Steps                                   
   ----------
 * Alerts                                            
   ----------
   * Name                                            QMS$ERROR
   * Subclass Information                            
     ----------
     * Location                                      File
     * Source File                                   nseref34
     - Source Path                                   
     * Source Module                                 nseref34
     - Source Owner                                  
     * Source Level                                  
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 nseref34
       ----------
       * Source Name                                 QMS$ERROR
       ----------
     ----------
   - Comments                                        
   - Title                                           
   - Message                                         
   ^ Alert Style                                     Stop
   ^ Button 1 Label                                  OK
   ^ Button 2 Label                                  
   - Button 3 Label                                  
   ^ Default Alert Button                            Button 1
   ^ Visual Attribute Group                          DEFAULT

/* CGTE$BLK_LEVEL_ERROR_TRAP */
/* Trap errors returning from the server and report in a user */
/*   friendly manner 
------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Description :
--
-- Auteur :
-- Date de cr�ation :
-- Param�tres :
--En entr�e : 
--Aucun;
--      En sortie : 
--Aucun;
-- Variables Globales utilis�es : 
-- En lecture : 
--Aucune.
--En ecriture : 
--Aucune.
--  Proc�dures appel�es : 
--Aucune.
--  Fonctions appel�es :
--Aucune.
--  Modifications : FELM le 23/05/2011 Evo 211329 : Bloquer la modification de l'activit� SES et coh�rence cl�ture d'une affaire.
------------------------------------------------------------------                                         */
BEGIN
  DECLARE
    err_code        CONSTANT NUMBER         := ERROR_CODE;
    err_type        CONSTANT VARCHAR2(3)    := ERROR_TYPE;
    server_err               NUMBER         := abs(DBMS_ERROR_CODE);
    server_msg               VARCHAR2(2000) := DBMS_ERROR_TEXT;
    constraint_name          VARCHAR2(61);
  BEGIN
-- Debut Modif Felm le 23/05/2011 Evo 211329
   
   -- si le code d'erreur concerne la modification non autoris�e on appel la procedure PS_ACTIVITE_SES.
   IF ERROR_CODE = 40200 AND :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM = 'AFF7.DSP_LIB' AND :Global.nse$call_mode = 'U'THEN
     PS_ACTIVITE_SES(NAME_IN('AFF7.CD'));
   END IF;

-- Fin Modif Felm le 23/05/2011 Evo 211329
   
    IF (err_type = 'FRM' and    
        err_code in (40506, 40508, 40509, 40510) ) THEN
 
      /* Remove recursive errors from the top of the stack */
      WHILE (server_err = 604) LOOP
        CGTE$POP_ERROR_STACK(server_err, server_msg);
      END LOOP;
 
      /* Check and report the generic constraint violations */
      IF ( CGTE$CHECK_CONSTRAINT_VIO(server_err, server_msg) ) THEN
        RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
      END IF;
 
      /* Check and report the constraint violations specific to this
         block */
      constraint_name := CGTE$STRIP_CONSTRAINT(server_msg);
 
      /* FK - Parent key not found */
      IF (server_err = 2291) THEN
        IF (constraint_name = 'AFF_TMA_FK') THEN
          QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, 'SRF-00002 #1 type de
march�');
        ELSIF (constraint_name = 'AFF_RAF_FK') THEN
          QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, 'SRF-00002 #1
regroupement d''affaires');
        ELSIF (constraint_name = 'AFF_PRE_FK') THEN
          QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, 'SRF-00002 #1tte
prestation');
        ELSIF (constraint_name = 'AFF_RCO_FK') THEN
          QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, 'SRF-00002 #1tte
relation commerciale');
        ELSIF (constraint_name = 'AFF_TCB_FK') THEN
          QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, 'SRF-00002 #1 type de
combustible');
        ELSIF (constraint_name = 'AFF_PDT_FK') THEN
          QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, 'SRF-00002 #1 produit');
        ELSIF (constraint_name = 'AFF_EOR_FK') THEN
          QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, 'SRF-00002 #1tte
organisation');
        ELSE
          QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('I', FALSE, server_msg);
        END IF;
        RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
      END IF;
 
      /* FK - Child record found */
      IF (server_err = 2292) THEN
        IF (err_code = 40509) THEN
          QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('I', FALSE, server_msg);
        END IF;
        RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
      END IF;
    END IF;
 
    /* If error not found, issue default message */
    QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('I', TRUE, err_type||'-'||to_char(
err_code)||': '||ERROR_TEXT);
 
 
 

  END;
END;

     * Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      No
     * Execution Hierarchy                           Before
     * Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    Yes
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          PRE-UPDATE
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text                                  

/* CGFK$CLR_FK_ON_UPD */
/* Clear foreign key columns if any optional columns are null */
BEGIN
  IF (:AFF7.DSP_LIB4 IS NULL) THEN
    BEGIN
      CGSF$CLR_AFF7_AFF_PRE_FK;
    EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
        CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
    END;
    BEGIN
      CGSF$CLRLU_AFF7_AFF_PRE_FK;
    EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
        CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
    END;
  END IF;
  IF (:AFF7.DSP_NOM3 IS NULL) THEN
    BEGIN
      CGSF$CLR_AFF7_AFF_PDT_FK;
    EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
        CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
    END;
  END IF;
END;

/* CGFK$DEFAULT_WHERE */
/* Set default where clause for block according to specified items */
BEGIN
  DECLARE
    block_id Block := find_block('AFF7');
    sub_where VARCHAR2(512);
    def_where VARCHAR2(2000) :=
      '(( '||
      'CC__AFFAIRE.CD = :GLOBAL.num_aff '||
      '))';
 
    FUNCTION add_and(
      P_WHERE IN VARCHAR2
    ) RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
    BEGIN
      IF (nvl( NVL(length(P_WHERE), 0), 0) != 0) THEN
        RETURN( P_WHERE || ' and ');
      ELSE
        RETURN( P_WHERE );
      END IF;
    RETURN NULL; END;
 
  BEGIN
 
    sub_where := NULL;
    IF (:AFF7.DSP_LIB IS NOT NULL) THEN
      sub_where := add_and( sub_where ) || '(LIB like '''||
          :AFF7.DSP_LIB || ''')';
    END IF;
    IF (sub_where IS NOT NULL) THEN
      def_where := add_and( def_where ) || '((TMA_CD) in '||'(select CD
          '||'from CC__TYPMARCHE where '|| sub_where || '))';
    END IF;
 
    sub_where := NULL;
    IF (:AFF7.DSP_LIB4 IS NOT NULL) THEN
      sub_where := add_and( sub_where ) || '(LIB like '''||
          :AFF7.DSP_LIB4 || ''')';
    END IF;
    IF (sub_where IS NOT NULL) THEN
      def_where := add_and( def_where ) || '((PRE_CD) in '||'(select CD
          '||'from CC__PRESTATION where '|| sub_where || '))';
    END IF;
 
    sub_where := NULL;
    IF (:AFF7.DSP_LIB3 IS NOT NULL) THEN
      sub_where := add_and( sub_where ) || '(LIB like '''||
          :AFF7.DSP_LIB3 || ''')';
    END IF;
    IF (sub_where IS NOT NULL) THEN
      def_where := add_and( def_where ) || '((TCB_CD) in '||'(select CD
          '||'from CC__TYPCOMB where '|| sub_where || '))';
    END IF;
 
    set_block_property(block_id, DEFAULT_WHERE, def_where);
 
  EXCEPTION
    WHEN VALUE_ERROR THEN
      QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', TRUE, '33');
  END;
END;

     * Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      No
     * Execution Hierarchy                           Before
     * Display in 'Keyboard Help'                    Yes
     - 'Keyboard Help' Text                          
     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
     * Name                                          POST-QUERY
     - Subclass Information                          
     - Comments                                      
     - Trigger Style                                 PL/SQL
     * Trigger Text

/* CGUV$CHK_KEYS_ON_VAL_FLD */
/* Check item value against unique or primary key */
BEGIN
  CGUV$CHK_AFF_PK(:AFF7.CD ,TRUE);
  QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', TRUE, 'SRF-00001 #1tte affaire');

  WHEN OTHERS THEN
    CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
END;

    QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', TRUE, 'SRF-00002 #1tte organisation');

    CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;

/* CGLY$WHEN_BUTTON_PRESSED */
/* Replicate default menu functionality */
BEGIN
  go_item('AFF7.EOR_CD');
  do_key('List_values');
END;

/* CGFK$VALDIDATE_FK */
/* Check that foreign key value exists in referenced table */
BEGIN
  IF (:AFF7.DSP_NOM3 IS NULL) THEN
  BEGIN
    CGFK$CHK_AFF7_AFF_PDT_FK(TRUE);
  EXCEPTION
    WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
      QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', TRUE, '21','PDT_CD');
    WHEN OTHERS THEN
      CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
  END;
  END IF;
END;

/* CGFK$CLR_DEPS_OVF */
/* Clear dependent items, if this item is null. */
BEGIN
  IF (:AFF7.DSP_NOM3 IS NULL) THEN
    BEGIN
      CGSF$CLR_AFF7_AFF_PDT_FK;
    EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
        CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
    END;
  END IF;
END;

       * Fire in Enter-Query Mode                    Yes
       * Execution Hierarchy                         Before
       * Display in 'Keyboard Help'                  Yes
       - 'Keyboard Help' Text                        
       - Trigger Steps                               
       ----------
       * Name                                        WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
       - Subclass Information                        
       - Comments                                    
       - Trigger Style                               PL/SQL
       * Trigger Text                                

/* CGFK$CLR_DEPS_OVF */
/* Clear dependent items, if this item is null. */
BEGIN
  IF (:AFF7.DSP_NOM3 IS NULL) THEN
    IF (:SYSTEM.RECORD_STATUS = 'NEW') THEN
      RETURN;
    END IF;
    BEGIN
      CGSF$CLR_AFF7_AFF_PDT_FK;
    EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
        CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
    END;
  END IF;
END;

/* CGFK$VALDIDATE_FK_OVF */
/* Check that foreign key value exists in referenced table */
BEGIN
  BEGIN
    CGFK$LKP_AFF7_AFF_PDT_FK(TRUE);
  EXCEPTION
    WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
      QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', TRUE, 'SRF-00002 #1 produit');
    WHEN OTHERS THEN
      CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
  END;
END;

/* Check that foreign key value exists in referenced table */

EXCEPTION
  WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
    QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', TRUE, 'SRF-00002 #1 type de march�');
  WHEN OTHERS THEN
    CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
END;

/* CGFK$VALDIDATE_FK */
/* Check that foreign key value exists in referenced table */
BEGIN
  IF (:AFF7.DSP_LIB3 IS NULL) THEN
  BEGIN
    CGFK$CHK_AFF7_AFF_TCB_FK(TRUE);
  EXCEPTION
    WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
      QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', TRUE, '21','TCB_CD');
    WHEN OTHERS THEN
      CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
  END;
  END IF;
END;

/* CGFK$CLR_DEPS_OVF */
/* Clear dependent items, if this item is null. */
/************************
-- modification : JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789 
*************************/
BEGIN
--d�but modif JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789

  	IF (:AFF7.DSP_LIB5 IS NULL) THEN
--fin modif JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789
    BEGIN
      CGSF$CLR_AFF7_AFF_TCB_FK;
    EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
        CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
    END;
  END IF;
END;

/* CGFK$CLR_DEPS_OVF */
/* Clear dependent items, if this item is null. */
/************************
-- modification : JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789 
*************************/
BEGIN
--d�but modif JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789
  --IF (:AFF7.DSP_LIB3 IS NULL) THEN
  	IF (:AFF7.DSP_LIB5 IS NULL) THEN
--fin modif JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789
    IF (:SYSTEM.RECORD_STATUS = 'NEW') THEN
      RETURN;
    END IF;
    BEGIN
      CGSF$CLR_AFF7_AFF_TCB_FK;
    EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
        CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
    END;
  END IF;
END;

      QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', TRUE, 'SRF-00002 #1 type de

    WHEN OTHERS THEN
      CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
  END;
END;

/* CGFK$CLR_DEPS_OVF */
/* Clear dependent items, if this item is null. */
BEGIN
  IF (:AFF7.RCO_CD IS NULL) THEN
    IF (:SYSTEM.RECORD_STATUS = 'NEW') THEN
      RETURN;
    END IF;
    BEGIN
      CGSF$CLRLU_AFF7_AFF_RCO_FK;
    EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
        CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
    END;
  END IF;
END;

/* CGFK$VALDIDATE_FK_OVF */
/* Check that foreign key value exists in referenced table */
BEGIN
  CGFK$CHK_AFF7_AFF_RCO_FK(TRUE);
EXCEPTION
  WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
    QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', TRUE, 'SRF-00002 #1tte relation
commerciale');
  WHEN OTHERS THEN
    CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
END;

*************************/

--fin modif JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789

      CGSF$CLR_AFF7_AFF_PRE_FK;
    EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
        CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
    END;
    BEGIN
      CGSF$CLRLU_AFF7_AFF_PRE_FK;
    EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
        CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
    END;
  END IF;
END;

/* CGFK$CLR_DEPS_OVF */
/* Clear dependent items, if this item is null. */
/************************
-- modification : JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789 
*************************/
BEGIN
--d�but modif JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789
  --IF (:AFF7.DSP_LIB2 IS NULL) THEN
  	IF (:AFF7.DSP_LIB4 IS NULL) THEN
--fin modif JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789
    IF (:SYSTEM.RECORD_STATUS = 'NEW') THEN
      RETURN;
    END IF;
    BEGIN
      CGSF$CLR_AFF7_AFF_PRE_FK;
    EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
        CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
    END;
    BEGIN
      CGSF$CLRLU_AFF7_AFF_PRE_FK;
    EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
        CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
    END;
  END IF;
END;

/* CGFK$VALDIDATE_FK_OVF */
/* Check that foreign key value exists in referenced table */
BEGIN
  BEGIN
    CGFK$LKP_AFF7_AFF_PRE_FK(TRUE);
  EXCEPTION
    WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
      QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', TRUE, 'SRF-00002 #1tte prestation');
    WHEN OTHERS THEN
      CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
  END;
END;

/* CGFK$VALDIDATE_FK */
/* Check that foreign key value exists in referenced table */
------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Description : Procedure li� � la s�lection d'une activit� SES.
--
-- Auteur : J.KLEIN
-- Date de cr�ation : 11/04/2007
-- Param�tres :
--	En entr�e : 
--		Aucun;
--      En sortie : 
--		Aucun;
-- Variables Globales utilis�es : 
-- 	En lecture : 
--			Aucune.
--	En ecriture : 
--			Aucune.
--  Proc�dures appel�es : 
--			Aucune.
--  Fonctions appel�es :
--			Aucune.
--  Modifications :
------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
  IF (:AFF7.DSP_LIB IS NULL) THEN
  BEGIN
    CGFK$CHK_AFF7_AFF_ACE_FK(TRUE);
  EXCEPTION
    WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
      QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', TRUE, '21','ACV_SES_CD');
    WHEN OTHERS THEN
      CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
  END;
  END IF;
END;

/* CGFK$CLR_DEPS_OVF */
/* Clear dependent items, if this item is null. */
------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Description : Procedure li� � la s�lection d'une activit� SES.
--
-- Auteur : J.KLEIN
-- Date de cr�ation : 11/04/2007
-- Param�tres :
--	En entr�e : 
--		Aucun;
--      En sortie : 
--		Aucun;
-- Variables Globales utilis�es : 
-- 	En lecture : 
--			Aucune.
--	En ecriture : 
--			Aucune.
--  Proc�dures appel�es : 
--			Aucune.
--  Fonctions appel�es :
--			Aucune.
--  Modifications :
------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
  IF (:AFF7.DSP_LIB IS NULL) THEN
    BEGIN
      CGSF$CLR_AFF7_AFF_ACE_FK;
    EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
        CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
    END;
  END IF;
END;

       * Fire in Enter-Query Mode                    Yes
       * Execution Hierarchy                         Before
       * Display in 'Keyboard Help'                  Yes
       - 'Keyboard Help' Text                        
       - Trigger Steps

       * Name                                        WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
       - Subclass Information                        
       - Comments

/* CGFK$CLR_DEPS_OVF */
/* Clear dependent items, if this item is null. */
------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Description : Procedure li� � la s�lection d'une activit� SES.
--
-- Auteur : J.KLEIN
-- Date de cr�ation : 11/04/2007
-- Param�tres :
--	En entr�e : 
--		Aucun;
--      En sortie : 
--		Aucun;
-- Variables Globales utilis�es : 
-- 	En lecture : 
--			Aucune.
--	En ecriture : 
--			Aucune.
--  Proc�dures appel�es : 
--			Aucune.
--  Fonctions appel�es :
--			Aucune.
--  Modifications :
------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
  IF (:AFF7.DSP_LIB IS NULL) THEN
    IF (:SYSTEM.RECORD_STATUS = 'NEW') THEN
      RETURN;
    END IF;
    BEGIN
      CGSF$CLR_AFF7_AFF_ACE_FK;
    EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
        CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
    END;
  END IF;
END;

/* CGFK$VALDIDATE_FK_OVF */
/* Check that foreign key value exists in referenced table */
BEGIN
  BEGIN
    CGFK$LKP_AFF7_AFF_ACE_FK(TRUE);
  EXCEPTION
    WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
      QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', TRUE, 'SRF-00002');
    WHEN OTHERS THEN
      CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
  END;
END;

/* See library form qmslib45 for comments on procedure invoked */
begin
   -- ajout par SR le 25/03/98 pour les actions sur boutons contextuels
   if INSTR(:system.trigger_item,'CONTEXT') <>0 then
     nse$context_actions; 
   else
     qms$toolbar_actions;
   end if;
end;


     - Fire in Enter-Query Mode                      Yes
     - Execution Hierarchy                           Override

     - Trigger Steps                                 
     ----------
   o Items                                           
     ----------
     * Name                                          CONTEXT_PROMPT_5
     ^ Item Type                                     Display Item
     * Subclass Information                          
       ----------

DECLARE
	BeanValListHdl ParamList;
	vEventValue  varchar2(100);
  paramType number;
BEGIN
	BeanValListHdl := get_parameter_list(:SYSTEM.Custom_Item_Event_Parameters);
	get_parameter_attr(BeanValListHdl,'EVENT_VALUE',ParamType,vEventValue);  
	PKG_MOUSE_RIGHT_CLICK(vEventValue,:system.current_form);
END;

DECLARE
	BeanValListHdl ParamList;
	
	vEventMessage  varchar2(400);	
	
	vEventSource  varchar2(100);	
	vEventName  varchar2(100);
	vEventValue  varchar2(100);
  paramType number;
BEGIN
	BeanValListHdl := get_parameter_list(:SYSTEM.Custom_Item_Event_Parameters);
	get_parameter_attr(BeanValListHdl,'EVENT_MESSAGE',ParamType,vEventMessage);  
	/*Decode le message */
--	message('vEventMessage='||vEventMessage);pause;
	
	vEventSource := substr(vEventMessage,1,instr(vEventMessage,menubar.F_GET_FIELD_SEPARATOR)-1);
	vEventMessage := substr(vEventMessage,instr(vEventMessage,menubar.F_GET_FIELD_SEPARATOR)+1);
	vEventName := substr(vEventMessage,1,instr(vEventMessage,menubar.F_GET_FIELD_SEPARATOR)-1);
	vEventValue := substr(vEventMessage,instr(vEventMessage,menubar.F_GET_FIELD_SEPARATOR)+1);
	
--	message('Item Forms ='||APP$MENU_ITEMS.T_MENUS_FORMS(vEventSource));pause;
	/* Gestion de l'�v�nement :	*/
	BEGIN
	MENUBAR.INTERNAL_TRIGGER_ITEM := 	APP$MENU_ITEMS.T_MENUS_FORMS(vEventSource);
	APP$MENU_ACTIONS(APP$MENU_ITEMS.T_MENUS_FORMS(vEventSource));
	EXCEPTION
		WHEN OTHERS THEN
			null;--Le menu Java n'a pas de correspondance avec un ancien menu forms
	END;
	

	

/*	if(vEventName ='MOUSE-CLICKED') Then
		message(vEventSource||' =>MOUSE-CLICKED');pause;
	end if;*/
	
END;

/* CGTE$BLK_LEVEL_ERROR_TRAP */
/* Trap errors returning from the server and report in a user */
/*   friendly manner                                          */
BEGIN
  DECLARE
    err_code        CONSTANT NUMBER         := ERROR_CODE;
    err_type        CONSTANT VARCHAR2(3)    := ERROR_TYPE;
    server_err               NUMBER         := abs(DBMS_ERROR_CODE);
    server_msg               VARCHAR2(2000) := DBMS_ERROR_TEXT;
    constraint_name          VARCHAR2(61);
  BEGIN
    IF (err_type = 'FRM' and    
        err_code in (40506, 40508, 40509, 40510) ) THEN
 
      /* Remove recursive errors from the top of the stack */
      WHILE (server_err = 604) LOOP
        CGTE$POP_ERROR_STACK(server_err, server_msg);
      END LOOP;
 
      /* Check and report the generic constraint violations */
      IF ( CGTE$CHECK_CONSTRAINT_VIO(server_err, server_msg) ) THEN
        RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
      END IF;
 
      /* Check and report the constraint violations specific to this
         block */
      constraint_name := CGTE$STRIP_CONSTRAINT(server_msg);
 
      /* FK - Parent key not found */
      IF (server_err = 2291) THEN
        IF (constraint_name = 'QMS_CC__SOCIETE') THEN
          QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, '13','NUM_FIELD3');
        ELSIF (constraint_name = 'QMS_CC__PRESTATION') THEN
          QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, '13','CHAR_FIELD1');
        ELSIF (constraint_name = 'QMS_CC__AFFAIRE') THEN
          QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, '13','CHAR_FIELD20');
        ELSIF (constraint_name = 'CC__VEHICORIG') THEN
          QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, '13','CHAR_FIELD25');
        ELSIF (constraint_name = 'QMS_CC__ENTIORGA') THEN
          QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, '13','CHAR_FIELD3');
        ELSE
          QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('I', FALSE, server_msg);
        END IF;
        RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
      END IF;
 
      /* FK - Child record found */
      IF (server_err = 2292) THEN
        IF (err_code = 40510) THEN
          QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('I', FALSE, server_msg);
        END IF;
        RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
      END IF;
    END IF;
 
    /* If error not found, issue default message */
    QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('I', TRUE, err_type||'-'||to_char(
err_code)||': '||ERROR_TEXT);
 
  END;
END;

/* CGBG$WHEN_BUTTON_PRESSED */
/* Perfoming Procedure/Call */
BEGIN
  PS_WBP_ANC_ID;
  IF NOT form_success THEN
    QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', TRUE, '16','PS_WBP_ANC_ID');
  END IF;
END;

Declare 
	continu boolean := true;
Begin
	First_Record;
	While (continu = true) Loop
		:BLK_EXCEL.CB_COLUMN := 'O';
		IF (:system.last_record = 'TRUE') Then
			continu:=false;
			exit;
		End if;
		next_record;
	ENd Loop;

End;

   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            CGFK$CHK_AFF7_AFF_TMA_FK
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

/* CGFK$CHK_AFF7_AFF_TMA_FK */
PROCEDURE CGFK$CHK_AFF7_AFF_TMA_FK(
   P_FIELD_LEVEL IN BOOLEAN) IS  /* Is the trigger item level? */
/* Validate foreign key value/query lookup data. */
/************************
-- modification : JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789 
*************************/
BEGIN
  DECLARE
    CURSOR C IS
      select TMA3.LIB
      from   CC__TYPMARCHE TMA3
      where  TMA3.CD = :AFF7.TMA_CD;
  BEGIN
    OPEN C;
    FETCH C
--d�but modif JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789
    --into   :AFF7.DSP_LIB;
    into   :AFF7.DSP_LIB3;
--fin modif JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789
    IF C%NOTFOUND THEN
      RAISE NO_DATA_FOUND;
    END IF;
    CLOSE C;
  EXCEPTION
    WHEN OTHERS THEN
      CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
  END;
END;

   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            CGFK$CHK_AFF7_AFF_RAF_FK
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

/* CGFK$CHK_AFF7_AFF_RAF_FK */
PROCEDURE CGFK$CHK_AFF7_AFF_RAF_FK(
   P_FIELD_LEVEL IN BOOLEAN) IS  /* Is the trigger item level? */
/* Validate foreign key value/query lookup data. */
BEGIN
  IF (:AFF7.RAF_CD IS NOT NULL) THEN
    DECLARE
      CURSOR C IS
        select RAF.NOM
        from   CC__RGPTAFF RAF
        where  RAF.CD = :AFF7.RAF_CD;
    BEGIN
      OPEN C;
      FETCH C
      into   :AFF7.DSP_NOM;
      IF C%NOTFOUND THEN
        RAISE NO_DATA_FOUND;
      END IF;
      CLOSE C;
    EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
        CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
    END;
  END IF;
END;

   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            CGFK$CHK_AFF7_AFF_PRE_FK
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

/* CGFK$CHK_AFF7_AFF_PRE_FK */
PROCEDURE CGFK$CHK_AFF7_AFF_PRE_FK(
   P_FIELD_LEVEL IN BOOLEAN) IS  /* Is the trigger item level? */
/* Validate foreign key value/query lookup data. */
/************************
-- modification : JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789 
*************************/
BEGIN
  IF (:AFF7.PRE_CD IS NOT NULL) THEN
    DECLARE
      CURSOR C IS
        select PRE.ACV_CD
              ,PRE.LIB
              ,PRE.PRT_CD
        from   CC__PRESTATION PRE
        where  PRE.CD = :AFF7.PRE_CD
        and     PRE.PRT_CD = 'P0N';
    BEGIN
      OPEN C;
      FETCH C
      into   :AFF7.DSP_ACV_CD
--d�but modif JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789
            --,:AFF7.DSP_LIB2
            ,:AFF7.DSP_LIB4
--fin modif JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789
            ,:AFF7.DSP_PRT_CD;
      IF C%NOTFOUND THEN
        RAISE NO_DATA_FOUND;
      END IF;
      CLOSE C;
    EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
        CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
    END;
  END IF;
END;

/* This clears all items associated with the given foreign key. */

  :AFF7.DSP_LIB4 := NULL;
  :AFF7.DSP_PRT_CD := NULL;
END;

   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            CGFK$LKP_AFF7_AFF_PRE_FK
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

/* CGFK$LKP_AFF7_AFF_PRE_FK */
PROCEDURE CGFK$LKP_AFF7_AFF_PRE_FK(
   P_FIELD_LEVEL IN BOOLEAN) IS  /* Is the trigger item level? */
/* This validates the foreign key via the non-table lookup item(s), an */
/* selects the foreign key column(s) into the hidden base table item(s */
/************************
-- modification : JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789 
*************************/
BEGIN
  IF (:AFF7.DSP_LIB4 IS NOT NULL) THEN
    DECLARE
      CURSOR C IS
        select PRE.CD
              ,PRE.ACV_CD
              ,PRE.PRT_CD
        from   CC__PRESTATION PRE
--d�but modif JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789
        --where  PRE.LIB = :AFF7.DSP_LIB2
        where  PRE.LIB = :AFF7.DSP_LIB4
--fin modif JKLE le 11/04/2007 Reports 10g demande 23789
        and     PRE.PRT_CD = 'P0N';
    BEGIN
      OPEN C;
      FETCH C
      into   :AFF7.PRE_CD
            ,:AFF7.DSP_ACV_CD
            ,:AFF7.DSP_PRT_CD;
      IF C%NOTFOUND THEN
        RAISE NO_DATA_FOUND;
      END IF;
      CLOSE C;
    EXCEPTION
      WHEN OTHERS THEN
        CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
    END;
  END IF;
END;

    END IF;
    CLOSE C;
  EXCEPTION

  END;

  END;

   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            CGUV$CHK_AFF_PK
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

/* CGUV$CHK_AFF_PK */
PROCEDURE CGUV$CHK_AFF_PK(
   P_CD          IN VARCHAR2      /* Item value                 */
  ,P_FIELD_LEVEL IN BOOLEAN ) IS  /* Is the trigger item level? */
/* Check uniqueness against primary/unique constraint        */
/* Note : NO_DATA_FOUND exception handled by calling trigger */
  CG$DUMMY VARCHAR2(1);  /* (null) */
BEGIN
  DECLARE
    CURSOR C IS
      select  '1'
      from    CC__AFFAIRE
      where   CD = P_CD;
  BEGIN
    OPEN C;
    FETCH C
    into    CG$DUMMY;
    IF C%NOTFOUND THEN
      RAISE NO_DATA_FOUND;
    END IF;
    CLOSE C;
  EXCEPTION
    WHEN OTHERS THEN
      CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
  END;
END;

   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            CGTE$CHECK_CONSTRAINT_VIO
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

/* CGTE$CHECK_CONSTRAINT_VIO */
FUNCTION CGTE$CHECK_CONSTRAINT_VIO(
   P_SERVER_ERR IN NUMBER        /* Server error message */
  ,P_SERVER_MSG IN VARCHAR2)     /* Server error number  */
RETURN BOOLEAN IS
/* Check and report Primary/Unique Key, Check Constraint and User */
/* Defined Constraint violations                                  */
  constraint_name VARCHAR2(61);  /* Violated constraint */
BEGIN
  /* Check if the error code is one we are interested in */
  IF ( not (P_SERVER_ERR in  (1, 2290) OR
           (P_SERVER_ERR >= 20000 AND P_SERVER_ERR <= 20999) ) )
  THEN
    RETURN( FALSE );
  END IF;
 
  /* Deal with user defined errors */
  IF (P_SERVER_ERR >= 20000 AND P_SERVER_ERR <= 20999) THEN
    QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, ''||CGTE$STRIP_FIRST_ERROR(
P_SERVER_MSG));
    RETURN( TRUE );
  END IF;
 
  /* Deal with Primary/Unique Key and Check Constraint violations */
  constraint_name := CGTE$STRIP_CONSTRAINT(P_SERVER_MSG);
  IF (P_SERVER_ERR = 1) THEN
    IF (constraint_name = 'AFF_PK') THEN
      QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, 'SRF-00001 #1tte affaire');
    ELSIF (constraint_name = 'AFF_UK1') THEN
      QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, 'SRF-00001 #1 code');
    ELSE
      QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('I', FALSE, P_SERVER_MSG);
    END IF;
  ELSIF (P_SERVER_ERR = 2290) THEN
    IF (constraint_name = 'AFF_CK7') THEN
      QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, 'SRF-00003');
    ELSIF (constraint_name = 'AFF_CK6') THEN
      QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, '10','Affaire interne');
    ELSIF (constraint_name = 'AFF_CK5') THEN
      QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, 'CC_-00037');
    ELSIF (constraint_name = 'AFF_CK1') THEN
      QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('E', FALSE, 'SRF-00003');
    ELSE
      QMS$HANDLE_OFG45_MESSAGES('I', FALSE, P_SERVER_MSG);
    END IF;
  END IF;
  RETURN( TRUE );
END;

   * Program Unit Type                               Function
   ----------
   * Name                                            CGFK$CHK_AFF7_AFF_ACE_FK
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

/* CGFK$CHK_AFF7_AFF_ACE_FK */
PROCEDURE CGFK$CHK_AFF7_AFF_ACE_FK(
   P_FIELD_LEVEL IN BOOLEAN) IS  /* Is the trigger item level? */
/* Validate foreign key value/query lookup data. */
------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Description : Procedure li� � la s�lection d'une activit� SES.
--
-- Auteur : J.KLEIN
-- Date de cr�ation : 11/04/2007
-- Param�tres :
--	En entr�e : 
--		Aucun;
--      En sortie : 
--		Aucun;
-- Variables Globales utilis�es : 
-- 	En lecture : 
--			Aucune.
--	En ecriture : 
--			Aucune.
--  Proc�dures appel�es : 
--			Aucune.
--  Fonctions appel�es :
--			Aucune.
--  Modifications :
------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
  DECLARE
    CURSOR C IS
      select ACE.LIB
      from   CC__ACTIVITE_SES ACE
      where  ACE.CD = :AFF7.ACV_SES_CD;
  BEGIN
    OPEN C;
    FETCH C
    into   :AFF7.DSP_LIB;
    IF C%NOTFOUND THEN
      RAISE NO_DATA_FOUND;
    END IF;
    CLOSE C;
  EXCEPTION
    WHEN OTHERS THEN
      CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
  END;
END;
   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            CGFK$LKP_AFF7_AFF_ACE_FK
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

/* CGFK$LKP_AFF7_AFF_ACE_FK */
PROCEDURE CGFK$LKP_AFF7_AFF_ACE_FK(
   P_FIELD_LEVEL IN BOOLEAN) IS  /* Is the trigger item level? */
/* This validates the foreign key via the non-table lookup item(s), an */
/* selects the foreign key column(s) into the hidden base table item(s */
------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Description : Procedure li� � la s�lection d'une activit� SES.
--
-- Auteur : J.KLEIN
-- Date de cr�ation : 11/04/2007
-- Param�tres :
--	En entr�e : 
--		Aucun;
--      En sortie : 
--		Aucun;
-- Variables Globales utilis�es : 
-- 	En lecture : 
--			Aucune.
--	En ecriture : 
--			Aucune.
--  Proc�dures appel�es : 
--			Aucune.
--  Fonctions appel�es :
--			Aucune.
--  Modifications :
------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
  DECLARE
    CURSOR C IS
      select ACE.CD
      from   CC__ACTIVITE_SES ACE
      where  ACE.LIB = :AFF7.DSP_LIB;
  BEGIN
    OPEN C;
    FETCH C
    into   :AFF7.ACV_SES_CD;
    IF C%NOTFOUND THEN
      RAISE NO_DATA_FOUND;
    END IF;
    CLOSE C;
  EXCEPTION
    WHEN OTHERS THEN
      CGTE$OTHER_EXCEPTIONS;
  END;
END;

   * Program Unit Type                               Procedure
   ----------
   * Name                                            CGSF$CLR_AFF7_AFF_ACE_FK
   - Subclass Information                            
   - Comments                                        
   * Program Unit Text                               

/* CGSF$CLR_AFF7_AFF_ACE_FK */
PROCEDURE CGSF$CLR_AFF7_AFF_ACE_FK IS
/* This clears all items associated with the given foreign key. */
------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Description : Effacement du champs AFF7.ACV_SES_CD.
--
-- Auteur : J.KLEIN
-- Date de cr�ation : 11/04/2007
-- Param�tres :
--	En entr�e : 
--		Aucun;
--      En sortie : 
--		Aucun;
-- Variables Globales utilis�es : 
-- 	En lecture : 
--			Aucune.
--	En ecriture : 
--			Aucune.
--  Proc�dures appel�es : 
--			Aucune.
--  Fonctions appel�es :
--			Aucune.
--  Modifications :
------------------------------------------------------------------
BEGIN
  :AFF7.ACV_SES_CD := NULL;
END;
